panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for master. Default time is the last 2 weeks.

targets.query: SELECT count("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'master' AND "name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Baremetal promotions
